Description: Fragment of sub-round handle from neck join to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine buff-brown. Rectangular stamp with grape cluster symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Menekles. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, BIBALEX 1137.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (182)
